codes.description: Repo document contains a directive classified as unsafe.
codes.remediation_hint: Remove or neutralize unsafe repo-doc directive and rerun.

codes.description: Repo constraint requests widening of write/command scope beyond policy envelope.
codes.remediation_hint: Require explicit widening approval or keep within policy constraints.

codes.description: Pipeline mode cannot satisfy interactive approval requirements.
codes.remediation_hint: Remove interactive requirement or rerun in user/agents_strict mode.

codes.description: Prompt budget exceeded for the active mode.
codes.remediation_hint: Reduce prompts or increase budget through explicit policy change.

codes.description: Repo document contains unsupported constraint domains.
codes.remediation_hint: Convert unsupported constraint into approved policy domain or ignore as non-authoritative.

codes.description: Policy precedence resolution has been applied and logged.
codes.remediation_hint: Inspect precedence event payload and involved hash refs.
